Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near 100th/Paxton
ShortDescription: J14 buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Torrence, 100th, Yates, 95th, and Jeffery due to, street blockage near 100th/Paxton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Torrence, 100th, Yates, 95th, and Jeffery, due to street blockage near 100th/Paxton.

Allow extra travel time.
